jcr:content.awardContent1: $12,400 plus an additional $2,400 Work & Learn Award (renewable for four years for a total of $59,200)
jcr:content.awardContent2: $6,000 plus an additional $2,400 Work & Learn Award (renewable for a total of $33,600)
jcr:content.awardContent3: $5,500 plus an additional $2,400 Work & Learn Award (renewable for four years for a total of $31,600)
jcr:content.awardName1: Girl Scout Youth of the Year Scholarship
jcr:content.awardReq1: Must have earned the Girl Scout Gold Award (and all required documentation) Must submit a letter of recommendation from Girl Scout staff person or adult leader
jcr:content.awardReq2: Must have earned the Girl Scout Gold Award (and all requested documentation)
jcr:content.awardReq3: Candidate must be a registered Girl Scout through her graduation year of high school (and all requested documentation)
